short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy URL of tab, link and image to clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the URL to the clipboard. You can select the URL from the tab list or the link list of the current page. It is also possible to copy in the link tag format.
